short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage multiple time zones effortlessly with Timezone Converter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Timezone Converter is the go-to Chrome extension for digital nomads, remote workers, and businesses operating globally. Easily keep track of time across different time zones with real-time updates. Features include:

• Real-time updates for local and selected time zones
• User-friendly interface for adding new time zones
• Customize time zone display to your preference

Install Timezone Converter today to stay ahead of time!
